It's about a time! Fingers crossed it's 3G with a decent camera and video!

From Telecom Trends: iPhone coming to Rogers: <p>QUOTE</p> <blockquote> <p>In a statement released this morning about the iPhone, Rogers has announced that it has reached an agreement with Apple to launch later this year.</p> <p>Ted Rogers is quoted in the very brief statement, saying:</p> <p>We're thrilled to announce that we have a deal with Apple to bring the iPhone to Canada later this year. We can't tell you any more about it right now, but stay tuned.</p> <p>As I wrote recently, there appears to be imminent plans to release an upgrade to the current iPhone.</p> </blockquote> <p>END QUOTE</p>
